episodes.title: Sex, Lies & Terror: The Larry Ray Tapes | News 12
episodes.description:
News 12's Senior Reporter Tara Rosenblum delves into the mind of Lawrence Ray, the so-called Sarah Lawrence sex cult leader who moved into his daughter's dorm and abused her roommates and friends. 

News 12's explosive new Crime Files special, 'Sex, Lies & Terror: The Larry Ray Tapes,' features the first interviews with Ray since he was sentenced to 60 years in prison for sex trafficking, extortion, and conspiracy, among other charges.

About News 12: News 12 is the exclusive 24-hour local news service dedicated to bringing you the best local news and information about your neighborhoods. Available to subscribers of Optimum (Ch. 12), Xfinity (Ch. 127), Spectrum (Ch. 12), and Fios (Ch. 529), News 12 provides 24-hour access to local breaking news, traffic, weather, sports, and more.
